channel.title: Thiago Carmo on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Passion4Social
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan TC - Thiago Carmo MM On this podcast I went to hear about an organisation called “Passion4Social”. So I spoke to Thiago Carmo, the marketing manager and senior designer of the organisation. Okay, so “Passion4Social” is a creative agency with a difference. Can you tell us what the difference is? TC Sure. Well, “Passion4Social” is a creative agency that we say is with a difference, because we are a social enterprise and our mission is to create sustainable employment for people with disabilities and the ones that have a long-term health condition.
